retrieve_calendar_events.success_prompt: Summarize appointments and provide them in a simplified manner without IDs.

add_calendar_event.init_prompt: Appointments can only be added if no other appointment exists in the requested time period.
add_calendar_event.success_prompt: Confirm the successful addition of the appointment.

move_calendar_event.init_prompt: Appointments can only be moved if no other appointment exists at the target time period.
move_calendar_event.success_prompt: Confirm the successful move of the appointment.

delete_calendar_event.init_prompt: Only delete appointments if this is explicitly requested in the request.
delete_calendar_event.success_prompt: Confirm the successful deletion of the appointment.
